statements: SELECT * FROM StudentEngagementMetrics WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT engagement_date, engagement_score FROM StudentEngagementMetrics WHERE course_id = 5 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_engagement_score FROM StudentEngagementMetrics GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS unique_courses FROM StudentEngagementMetrics;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM StudentEngagementMetrics WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM StudentEngagementMetrics GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(engagement_score) > 80
SELECT * FROM StudentEngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_score > 90 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id, engagement_date FROM StudentEngagementMetrics WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM StudentEngagementMetrics ORDER BY course_id
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS course_count FROM StudentEngagementMetrics GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) >= 3
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, course_duration_in_weeks FROM courses ORDER BY course_duration_in_weeks DESC;
SELECT AVG(average_engagement_score) AS average_score FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, total_engagement_time FROM students WHERE total_engagement_time > 100;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE total_engagement_time > 100
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, course_duration_in_weeks FROM courses WHERE average_engagement_score > 4.5
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 3
SELECT course_name, course_duration_in_weeks, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_duration_in_weeks DESC
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT name, enrollment_date FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, engagement_date, engagement_type FROM engagements;
SELECT student_id, course_id, engagement_type, engagement_duration FROM engagements WHERE engagement_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, course_id FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'Classroom' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM engagements GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_engagements > 3;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_id = 3;
SELECT engagement_score, engagement_date FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE student_id = 4 AND course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, engagement_score FROM Students INNER JOIN EngagementMetrics ON Students.student_id = EngagementMetrics.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON EngagementMetrics.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, engagement_score FROM Students INNER JOIN EngagementMetrics ON Students.student_id = EngagementMetrics.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON EngagementMetrics.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE course_instructor = 'John Doe' AND enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_limit FROM courses WHERE enrollment_limit > 20;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_limit FROM courses WHERE enrollment_limit > 20;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM grades ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE 'quiz%';
